overview: Singer Conny Dachs has a massive hit new single, and that’s why he’s come to Costa Brava to meet a music producer with his manager Jason Steel, however this is one trip that won’t go as planned… Fucking the producer’s wife Marilyn Sugar, getting down and dirty with the company’s employee Gabi Gold, and even Julia Parker will show up for some more unannounced fun. Private Specials, Sexy Fiesta, good music and good sex guaranteed!
title: Sexy Fiesta
